items.sentence: I'd never seen anything quite like that before.
Have you ever tried doing this a different way?
It's no use trying to convince Tom to help you.
What time do I have to get up tomorrow morning?
Would it be OK if I slept on your sofa tonight?
How soon do you think you'll finish doing that?
My wife does the cooking and I wash the dishes.
It could take weeks before this gets this done.
I told them they could do whatever they wanted.
I made a stencil so it would be easier to draw.
